reviews.review:
After years of having not played Counter-Strike, it's good to be back! I used to play 1.6 and Source, and logged many hours on both. This installment follows the mantra "if it ain't broken, don't fix it".

Unfortunately, after pumping nearly 12 hours into the game, spending the additional $15 for "fair matchmaking", and getting out of the "level 2" restriction for competitive, I'm almost only facing off against hackers and smurfs. I guess that's the kind of thing you deal with in any free-to-play game, now that it's free, and even furthermore, in a competitive FPS such as Counter-Strike.

I'm sure over time, I'll rank up and find my way into the ranking system and the smurfs and hackers will naturally decrease. However, after my nearly 12 hours, I've yet to get all my competitive wins to get placed, as most of my games I get wiped by said players.

Strange set-up, but it's still the classic FPS I've grown to love over nearly 15-20 years, and I'm glad to be back. Unfortunately, getting started isn't all that fun, due to the online community. That being said, Counter-Strike was never known for its STELLAR community.

классная игра один из лучших шутеров на этой планете.Рекомендую всем эту игру

Играю хоть недавно но игра зачёт!

CSGO    (********)
地图十分多样性,游戏体验也非常好,皮肤也还不错,外挂吧还行打竞技就没有了,不过里面玩家素质就差点意思了(如有冒犯勿喷),跟我发现啊竞技(排位)里面还有一点段位低的人(我段位很高但是还能匹配到)所以啦萌新不好就别喷他们啦,这游戏需要眼观四路耳听八方(不然小心别人来一个背刺哦)总之游戏挺有趣升级也挺快的(3~4局竞技全赢的话那就可以升一级)所以就给八星评价啦!
Great game for killing time. Would recommend!

The game is currently filled with a lot of Ruski so if you want to learn russian this game is for you but if you want to play competitvly it will take time to rank up to gold nova master and only after this rank you will start to play the game as intented.
Also matchmaking is broken, as a gold nova 2 I get people who are ranked DMG vs me(about 4 or 5 ranks above me).
